name: distraction-phrase
description: Chrome extension that helps users avoid distraction by requiring a phrase to access blocked sites

scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-assets && npm run flatten && npm run fix-imports && npm run build-background
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp src/popup/*.html dist/ && cp src/popup/*.css dist/ && cp src/block/*.html dist/ && cp src/block/*.css dist/
scripts.flatten: mv dist/block/block.js dist/ && mv dist/popup/popup.js dist/ && rmdir dist/block dist/popup
